nodes.bodyText:
I have pushed an RTL test to verify collapsible sidebar, so you can get rid of this test in e2e.
Please fetch my changes first, so your repo gets updated.
git fetch timur-isangulov
git rebase timur-isangulov/DHFPROD-4589
@timur-isangulov Please remove these methods too which are not being used
@timur-isangulov is this method being used ? any reason why it is not squashed into single commit
This function might be useful for the future tests. Srikanth made a commit with the test, probably shouldn't squash.
